summary: Final testing of TopTube World Pro - All 8 features verified: 197 countries with channels, sitemap with 405+ URLs, robots.txt, contact form, scheduler with 3 jobs, homepage stats. Found and fixed API_URL bug in contact form.

integration_issues.issue: Used undefined 'API_URL' instead of 'API' variable - FIXED by T1 agent

197_countries_with_channels.details: All 197 countries have at least 1 channel, 200 total channels tracked

contact_form.frontend_ui: PASS - After fix, form submits successfully
contact_form.bug_fixed: Changed API_URL to API in line 617 of App.js

bug_fixed.issue: Contact form used undefined 'API_URL' variable instead of 'API'

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All pages load, all features work after fix

context_for_next_testing_agent: All features complete. Background scheduler running with 3 jobs. Sitemap has 405 URLs. All 197 countries have channels. Contact form works after API_URL->API fix. Resend email is MOCKED (stores to DB instead). Google Analytics/AdSense have placeholder IDs.
mocked_apis_note: Resend email integration is not configured - contact form submissions are stored in MongoDB 'contact_submissions' collection instead of sending actual emails. Google Analytics and AdSense have placeholder IDs.
